overview:
Mr. Kane has over twenty years experience in business information technology, including stints at global software leader SAP (SAP AG-NYSE) and Sperry Univac (Unisys UIS-NYSE).

He’s a solutions architect with topLingo Development in Irvine, California. topLingo is in it’s 8th year of business and has delivered over 400 projects to companies like JPMorgan/Chase, Air New Zealand, Universal Studios and Monster.com and iconic entertainers like Miles Davis (MilesDavis.com) and Carlos Santana.

Previously, Mr. Kane built a successful web business focused on the development and marketing of commercial websites and the integration of ecommerce applications into back end logistics and accounting systems.

As an applications consultant for SAP, he led project teams in the implementation of SAP R/3 software for Fortune 500 clients like Weyerhaeuser (WA) and large manufacturing and distribution operations like Allison Transmissions (IN), Karl Storz Endoscopy-America (Culver City, CA), Georg Fischer Systems (Irvine, CA), Virco Manufacturing (Torrance, CA) and others.
